author: Staff Reporter
text:
Two-year old child S. Sam Remiro of Mela Kurumbanai Thomaiyar Street in Karungal was run over by a school van here on Saturday. The incident took place when the victim’s mother, S. Nisha, was sending her elder daughter S. Antletchana (4) to school in a van.

While she was concentrating on her daughter, Sam Remiro had gone near the front wheel. As soon as the girl boarded the van, the driver moved the vehicle without noticing the boy standing in front of the van.

The boy was crushed to death under the wheels. The body was taken to the Kanyakumari Government Medical College Hospital for post mortem. Karungal police have registered a case and are investigating.
title: Two-year-old boy run over by school van
